title: Cum For The Viking 3
description: From innocent... to temptress...Believing in her mother's prophetic words, Lora Green assumes that Matheus Hrolf is going to whisk her away from England and make her his wife. To her grave disappointment, the Dutch merchant is offered a job too generous to resist, and he leaves Lora in the clutches of the Viking leader, Finn Vapnfjord. Fearing that she is a witch, Finn struggles to resist the naked beauty in his bedchamber. Roles are suddenly reversed, as Lora is bent on seduction, and she longs to be with Finn in every way possible.This story contains erotic romance, oral sex, lusty Vikings, seduction, an orgy, and anal sex. All characters are eighteen and above. Adult 18+
author: Virginia Wade
